author: Beth Mole
title: CDC’s failed coronavirus tests were tainted with coronavirus, feds confirm
description: A federal investigation found CDC researchers not following protocol.
content: Enlarge/ Barricades stand outside the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) headquarters in Atlanta, Georgia, on Saturday, March 14, 2020. As the novel coronavirus has spread in the US, the CDC is under increasing heat to defend a shaky rollout of … [+3118 chars]
